Summary: Was at work went outside to railcars and saw a bright white globe the size of a basketball come over our building and travel north almost following rail line. Went about a mile then blinked out.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Putnam
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was shocked and imediatly told my friends on a Internet board I use. I then called my wife. I feel a bit lost about it. I did not lose site it just disappeared .
